original_text: Because God is kind, he teaches us to stop living in a bad way. We no longer do the bad things that do not make God happy. We turn away from the bad things that belong to this world. God teaches us to control ourselves wisely while we live in this world. He teaches us to do what is right. He teaches us to please him in the way that we live.
korean_text: 우리를 양육하시되 경건하지 않은 것과 이 세상 정욕을 다 버리고 신중함과 의로움과 경건함으로 이 세상에 살고

sentences.original_text: he teaches us to stop living in a bad way

sentences.original_text: We no longer do the bad things
